title: Kimba the white lion. Volume 7
brief_description: Contains three episodes from the classic television series (fans of the original series note that these are not the original voices) of Kimba, King of the Jungle, a bravehearted white lion cub. Kimbas adventures bring him across new friends and sometimes some very unfriendly visitors, which often lands him in a spot of bother. However he always bounces back with enthusiasm and life, willing to give anything a go. The episodes on this tape are: ‘The Cobweb caper’, ‘A Friend indeed’ and the ‘Bad baboon’.
